name: AEROKEYS NIGERIA LIMITED
about: Aerokeys Nigeria Limited (ANL) is a registered Approved Training Organization, operating in Nigeria's aviation sector since 2009. We provide comprehensive training for flight crew, cabin crew, and airline instructors, as well as safety management and other aviation-related services. With over 20 years of experience, we partner with global conglomerates to deliver exceptional training and consulting solutions. Our core values, encapsulated in the acronym CRECH, emphasize professionalism, customer satisfaction, and excellence. We are committed to safety and excellence in all our services, including aircraft lease and charter, safety audits, and maintenance. Our team is well-trained to meet the highest industry standards, ensuring we always exceed our clients' expectations.
services:
["Initial/Abinitio
Recurrent
Conversion/Differences
Refresher
Aviation First Aid/AVMED
Crew Resource Management (CRM)
Fire and Smoke
Water Survival
Aviation Security Training
Dangerous Goods Regulations
Conflict Management and Restraint Training
Customer Care/Service Excellence
VVIP Training"]
